content.description: Start on a good side pull and crimp on the lower left part of the boulder. Follow the obvious crack/seam across the face using some delicate foot work before making some tough moves to top out.
content.location: Just past the Fin Boulder on the left hand side of the trail

content.description: Start low on large slot just left of the arete above the overhang. Pull up through some crimps to the stand start and finish the same. Video Link
content.location: On the same arete as Sunshine Arete but start sitting at the very bottom of the boulder.

content.description: Starts on large side pulls on the left arete of the boulder. Make big move up to good sloper and keep it together for the top out. Video Link
content.location: Located on the opposite side of the Sunshine boulder as you approach it.

content.description: Start on crimps follow seam to lock off before the lip. Landing can be very wet as a stream runs along the boulder.
content.location: Located on same boulder as Sunshine Arete, about 10 feet to the left of the arete.

content.description: Sit start low on the obvious rail. Mantle up, working left and up the quickly thinning seam. Establish feet high atop the seam on small edges. Top out on a good ledge above.
content.location: Right of the gearshift area, near the top of Sunshine Valley.

content.description: Start on crimp rail to the right just under the arete. Slap up through slopers and top out. Be careful of the boulder behind you. Video Link
content.location: Located farther down the creek bed to the left of the large boulder in the middle of the valley. On the right wall of a little cave area.

content.description: Start on the sharp arete of the larger boulder. One hand on arete other on side pull work your way up arete to top out. Video Link
content.location: Follow the trail past the creek bed the Fin is located on the first two boulders on your right.

content.description: Shady area in the middle of the Hocking Hills climbing area. Stays damp a lot of the time. Valley/ creek bed area with a few large boulders.
